Health data is personal data and is considered sensitive. It is subject to special protection under the law (European regulation on the protection of personal data - RGPD, Loi Informatique et Libertés, Code de la santé publique, etc.) in order to guarantee respect for the privacy of individuals.

question.title: What is the primary purpose of health data protection?

option_a.title: To improve the efficiency of clinical trials

option_b.title: To enhance the accuracy of health research

option_c.title: To protect the privacy of individuals

option_d.title: To reduce the administrative burden on healthcare providers

correct_option.title: To protect the privacy of individuals
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
